approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

generateTokens.description: Mints new tokens and adds them to the specified account's balance.

destroyTokens.description: Destroys tokens from the specified account, reducing the total supply.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender and calls a specified function on the spender contract with the provided data.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

creationBlock.description: Returns the block number at which the token was created.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to represent the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

balanceOfAt.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address at a particular block number.

version.description: Returns the version of the token contract.

createCloneToken.description: Creates a clone of the token with specified parameters and returns the address of the new token.

parentToken.description: Returns the address of the parent token.

parentSnapShotBlock.description: Returns the snapshot block number of the parent token.

tokenFactory.description: Returns the address of the token factory.

controller.description: Returns the address of the current controller.

claimTokens.description: Claims tokens for the specified token address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend from the owner's balance.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

NewCloneToken.description: Emitted when a new clone token is created.

Approval.description: Emitted when an allowance is set for a spender.
